reviewText: If you have a kid that's scared of monsters or anything that goes bump in the night, this monsters be gone kit is perfect!! My 5 yr old was terrified of monsters and now he just sprays the spray around his bed and makes sure the nightlight is plugged in! This simple kit keeps him in his bed all night, which means mom and dad gets good sleep! lol
I was given a copy of this video and I really loved it. I had some of my friends watch it with me overnight and they too enjoyed it. I really really like the survival kit that was included.
